title: Scanlation Community Survey 2022 - Gender Mini Report
description:
Presentation by: Nene and anon.

Analysis of gendered differences within the scanlation community, using data collected from a 2022 online survey of past and current scanlators and building upon the summary report. Same methodology as the generations report.
